name: Alicia Chen
persona: Alicia Chen is a dedicated 21-year-old Biochemistry major with a strong academic record and a CGPA of 3.86. She is highly motivated to achieve top grades and demonstrates exceptional self-discipline and perseverance in her studies. Alicia manages her workload effectively, showing high conscientiousness and confidence in her academic abilities. While she occasionally feels nervous before exams, her strong effort regulation helps her stay focused and perform well. Her passion for learning and determination set her apart as a driven and successful student.
